moreBlocks.articles:
• Car Accidents
    The Rhode Island Department of Transportation reports that in 2006 there were over 43,000 motor vehicle crashes which resulted in 81 deaths and thousands of personal injuries.
  • Medical Negligence
    Have you been injured by medical error? By law, health care professionals are required to provide a standard of care in addressing your needs.
  • Asbestos Exposure & Mesothelioma
    Asbestos Exposure & MesotheliomaIf you have a diagnosis of Mesothelioma, there are recognized causes of this terrible disease as a result of exposure to asbestos.
  • Slip and Falls
    Slip and fall accidents are the most common claims in premise liability lawsuits.

description: Experienced attorney Ronald J. Resmini founded our multigenerational family-owned Seekonk law firm, Ronald J. Resmini Law Offices, Ltd., with the goal of protecting the rights of victims of negligence who reside in the Commonwealth of Massachusetts. For over 40 years, the residents of Rhode Island have put their faith in our law firm, and, now, the residents of Massachusetts can do the same...
